description: This biology course emphasizes learning strategies and critical thinking skills as
applied to the curriculum of BIO 150.  Objectives of the course are met through
additional readings, problem sets, brief written assignments, introduction of
discipline-specific writing styles, projects (including individual and/or group oral
presentation), and library research. Assignments include new content that complements
introductory biology.  P/N only. Offered annually. Prerequisites: concurrent enrollment
in BIO 150 and permission of instructor.
